name: Shield of the Oathbound
description: Forged in the fires of ancient vows, the shield deflects all harm for the loyal, or weighs heavy upon the arms of the faithless. (Self: DEF +1; Other: ATK -1 for 3 turns)

name: Banner of the Eternal King
description: The lost banner rallies allies to valor, or saps the courage of foes who behold it. (Self: HP +1; Other: effect: battle)

name: Sanctified Blade
description: Blessed steel sharpens the arm of kin, or rends the armor of the unworthy. (Self: tempBuff ATK +1 for 3 turns; Other: tempDebuff DEF -1 for 2 turns)

name: Oathkeeper’s Vigor
description: The vow fortifies the heart of brothers, or chills the marrow of their enemies. (Self: HP +1; Other: RES -1)

name: Seal of Judgement
description: The sacred seal bestows blessing upon the loyal, or calls the guilty to trial by steel. (Self: loot; Other: effect: battle)

name: Knight’s Respite
description: A brief rest renews the sworn, but denies respite to the foe. (Self: HP +1; Other: ATK -1)

name: Ironclad March
description: The steady march empowers allied lines, or breaks the formation of the enemy. (Self: tempBuff DEF +2 for 2 turns; Other: tempDebuff RES -1 for 3 turns)

name: Vow of the First King
description: Ancient words heal the blood of knights, or ignite strife among the enemy host. (Self: HP +1; Other: effect: battle)
